title: Manage Hazardous Materials
description: A supply chain manager needs to arrange the transportation of hazardous materials (e.g., primers, sealants) to the assembly line.

tasks.description: Retrieve the Safety Data Sheet (SDS) for the hazardous material to identify its handling and shipping requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the SDS and notes the material is flammable.

tasks.description: Ensure the material is packaged in UN-approved containers with the correct hazard labels.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the packaging and labeling are compliant.

tasks.description: Arrange for a certified hazardous materials carrier to transport the items and generate the required shipping manifest.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent books a certified carrier and creates the shipping paperwork.
